eval-entry.title: Perform an Evaluation
eval-entry.heading: Questionnaire
eval-entry.pain-question: Do you have pain from pushing?
eval-entry.fatigue-question: Do you have fatigue from pushing?
eval-entry.years-question: How many years have you been in a manual chair?

training.Label: Powering SmartDrive
Bullets: Press back on the rocker switch to power on the SmartDrive, and forward to power off.

training.Label: Powering PushTracker
Bullets: Press the left raised button on the PushTracker to power on.
Press and hold for 3 seconds to enter sleep mode 'zzz' and power off.

training.Label: Tap Gesture
Bullets: Keeping your wrist straight, make contact on the push-rim with the palm of your hand.
A red light will illuminate upon successful tap.
Tip: You do not need to make contact with the PushTracker band.
Tip: Avoid moving your hand in a 'fishtail' like motion. This will lead to inconsistent tap recognition.

training.Label: Starting & Setting Speed
Bullets: Double-tap to initiate the SmartDrive. It will then begin to accelerate.
Then, single-tap to set your desired speed.
To increase speed, give a faster push and then single tap to set your desired speed.

training.Label: Steering
Bullets: To steer, gently grip the push-rim of the direction you want to go.
Light grip will allow you to veer.
Allow the push-rim to slide through your hands.

training.Label: Turning
Bullets: To turn, firmly grip the push-rim of the direction you want to go.
Firm grip will allow you to turn.
The tighter you grip, the sharper you will turn.
Tip: An optimal center of gravity position of the rear wheels will reduce the grip needed to make sharp turns.

training.Label: Stopping
Bullets: Double-tap to disengage the SmartDrive.
Then coast and brake with your hands.
Tip: To stop quickly, perform a single-tap followed by a quick combined tap and grab.

videos.title: Videos
videos.description: Training and usage videos for SmartDrive and PushTracker
videos.overview-desc: This video is an overview of SmartDrive being used by people of varying ages and circumstances in a variety of environments.

videos.sea-basic-op-desc: This video covers the basic operation and functionality of the Smart Evaluation App.
videos.eval-training-desc: This video covers the steps to perform when doing a SmartDrive Evaluation or Training
videos.interview-desc: In this video, I interview Chels and Steph about the many aspects of their lives, and how they have been impacted by SmartDrive

general.title: Smart Evaluation
general.heading: Sketch key points for the following:

demo-detail.scan-sd: SD: Press scan or edit button
demo-detail.scan-pt: PT: Press scan or edit button

pairing.Label: Pairing Your PushTracker to the App
Bullets: Press and hold the right flat button on your PushTracker for three seconds to enter the settings menu
Press the right button to scroll to the phone/PT icon.
Press the left raised button to initiate pairing.

pairing.Label: Connecting your PushTracker to the App
Bullets: With the PushTracker app open, press the right flat button on the PushTracker
You will see a 'Success' notification in the app.
Note: if you don't see a 'Success' notification in the app then you may need to re-pair your PushTracker

pairing.Label: Tap Gesture
Bullets: Press and hold the right flat button on your PushTracker for three seconds to enter the settings menu
Press the right button to scroll to the PT-SD icon.
Press the left raised button to initiate pairing your PushTracker to your SmartDrive.

bluetooth.sd_app_conn_instructions: For the app to be able to see and connect to a SmartDrive, you must have the SmartDrive ON and power assist OFF / 'SD Off'.  If you have trouble, turn the SmartDrive OFF and then ON.
bluetooth.pt_app_conn_instructions: To connect the PushTracker to the app, you must have the app open on your phone, then press and release the right button on the PushTracker. This will either connect your PushTracker to your app or take you into the pairing settings of the PushTracker. After pairing, you will need to leave the settings menu and then press the right button to connect to the app. If you have trouble, put the PushTracker to SLEEP and then turn it ON.
